tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_objects (
    object_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    object_name VARCHAR(255),
    object_type VARCHAR(50),
    location_x FLOAT,
    location_y FLOAT,
    location_z FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE object_properties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    object_id INT,
    property_name VARCHAR(255),
    property_value VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (object_id) REFERENCES virtual_objects(object_id)
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_objects (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    scale DECIMAL,
    rotation DECIMAL,
    properties JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE object_properties (
    property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    object_id UUID REFERENCES virtual_objects(id),
    key VARCHAR(100),
    value VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE object_tags (
    tag_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    object_id UUID REFERENCES virtual_objects(id),
    tag_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE ObjectProperties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    object_id INT,
    property_name VARCHAR(50),
    value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (object_id) REFERENCES VirtualObjects(id)
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_objects (
    object_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    object_name VARCHAR(255),
    object_type VARCHAR(50),
    location GEOMETRY,
    create_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE object_properties (
    property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    object_id UUID REFERENCES virtual_objects(object_id),
    property_name VARCHAR(100),
    property_value VARCHAR(255),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE object_interaction (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    object_id UUID REFERENCES virtual_objects(object_id),
    user_id UUID,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);
